metadata.name: Noisy Boi #1
metadata.description:
There once was a noisy GLSL shader  
Who was also a very rude boy  
He'd cause all kinds of chaos  
With his pixelated joy

He'd flicker and flash  
On the screens of all kinds  
Distracting and annoying  
Leaving users behind

But despite his misbehaving  
No one could deny  
The beauty he created  
When he was running high

So if you see this noisy boy  
In your code or on your screen  
Try not to get too angry  
It's just his way, it seems

But do be sure to tame him  
And keep him in check  
For he can be quite dangerous  
If he gets out of control, so to speak

So let the noisy GLSL shader  
Do his thing with all his might  
Just be sure to keep him in line  
And everything will be alright.
